author: The Editorial Board
title: Putin Protects Assad Again
text:
As the carnage in Syria continues, the United Nations is rousing its feeble outrage. But that is no match for Vladimir Putinâ€™s determination to protect his client Bashar Assad.

The Security Council met Thursday to debate a Swedish and Kuwaiti proposal for a 30-day Syrian cease-fire to stop Assad forces that are pounding rebel strongholds in Eastern Ghouta with an extermination-level bombing campaign. The U.N. resolution would allow the delivery of humanitarian aid and medical evacuations for the grievously injured, who include...
